name: Bodyguard (AlphaQ)
description:
Thanks for checking out my first game jam game!

Ever wanna just protect your boss? Well here’s the game for you!

Bodyguard is an arcade style platform game where you go to great lengths to protect your boss, even risking your own life.

Use A and D to move around

Use W to Jump, use it on walls to wall jump

Left click in the direction of a box to pick it up

Left click again to drop the box

Right click to toss the box

It was definitely a challenge creating this game in only 72 hours, but it was a great way to learn and push myself further.
